text: Paul Wolfisberg (15 June 1933 â€“ 24 August 2020) was a Swiss footballer and coach. He was born in Horw, Switzerland. Between 1950 to 1954 and 1955 to 1966, he played for FC Luzern. For one year between 1954 to 1955, he played for FC Biel-Bienne. Between 1966 to 1973, he managed SC Buochs. In 1975 and again from 1978 to 1981, he managed Luzern. Between 1981 to 1985, he managed the Swiss national team. Wolfisberg died on 24 August 2020 in Horw, aged 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swiss footballers Category:Swiss football managers Category:Sportspeople from the canton of Lucerne
title: Paul Wolfisberg
